de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.data

Class DDMData

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.data.TagData
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.data.DDMData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DDMData>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DDMDataBibliotheca

    public class DDMData
extends TagData
implements java.lang.Comparable<DDMData>
    Class extends the basic tag data with the specific DDM (Daenisches Daten Modell). Instances of this class and sub-classes implicitly support XML serializing by JAXB. The DDM data layout in hex: SV CC PP SS..SS CCCC NNNN II..II S = media status 4 bits V = version number 4 bits C = number of media parts 1 byte P = part number (zero if n = 1) 1 byte S = signature 16 bytes C = CRC of tag data except CRC 2 bytes N = ISO nation code 2 bytes I = ISIL library code 9 bytes
    Author:
    Patrick Rogalla
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        data - the data to initialize the data-model with
        size - the number of bytes to copy from the passed data array
